tasks.title: Setup and Configure the Extension
tasks.description: Setup and configure the Copilot extension.

subtasks.title: Clone the Repository
subtasks.description: Clone the repository to your local machine.

subtasks.title: Install Dependencies
subtasks.description: Install the necessary dependencies for the project.

subtasks.title: Set Environment Variables
subtasks.suggested_code:
export PORT=8080
export CLIENT_ID=Iv1.0ae52273ad3193eb
export CLIENT_SECRET="your_client_secret"
export FQDN=https://6de513480979.ngrok.app

subtasks.title: Start ngrok
subtasks.description: Start ngrok with the specified port.

subtasks.title: Run the Application
subtasks.description: Run the application using the Go command.
